msg: Change if expression to pass audit runs.

author: donaldp
msg: Make it possible for the kernel to be persistent (ie run even when no applications are present) by specifying persistent=true in parameters.

author: donaldp
msg: Forgot to commit this last nite...
Make the frontend allow you to specify that the server is to be persistent (ie run when no apps are currently present) by passing in --persistent flag.
